fluff.name: Expert Sidekick
entries: The expert is a master of certain tasks or knowledge. This sidekick follows a path that favors cunning over brawn or spellcasting. It might be a scout, a musician, a librarian, a clever street kid, a wily merchant, or a burglar.

fluff.name: Spellcaster Sidekick
entries: A sidekick who becomes a spellcaster walks the paths of magic. The sidekick might be a hedge wizard, a priest, a soothsayer, a spell-wielding performer, or a person with magic in their veins.

fluff.name: Warrior Sidekick
entries: A warrior sidekick grows in martial prowess as it fights by your side. It might be a soldier, a town guard, a battle-trained beast, or any other creature honed for combat.

fluff.name: 专家协力者
entries: 专家是一位特定工作或学识的大师，偏爱智慧而非蛮劲。专家可以是一位斥候，一位音乐家，一位图书管理员，一个聪明的流浪儿，一位狡猾的商人，或者一名窃贼。

fluff.name: 施法协力者
entries: 遵循魔法之道的协力者会成为施法者。协力者可能会成为一位不太专业的法师，一位祭司，一位算命者，或者以自己的方法驱使魔法的角色。

fluff.name: 武者协力者
entries: 一位武者协力者会在与你并肩作战时磨炼自己的武术技巧。它可能是一位士兵，一个城镇守卫，一只受过战斗训练的动物，或者任何其他在战斗中磨砺自身技艺的生物。

classFeature.name: 额外熟练
entries: {@i 1级专家特性}
协力者获得以下一项你所选豁免检定的熟练：敏捷，智力，或魅力。
此外，协力者获得5项你所选技能的熟练，并且它获得轻甲熟练。如果它是一个类人生物或在其资料版中具有一项简易或军用武器，它也会获得所有简易武器和两种你所选择工具的熟练。

classFeature.name: 好帮手
entries: {@i 1级专家特性}
协力者擅长提供恰到好处的帮助：专家能够以一个附赠动作进行{@action 协助}动作。

classFeature.name: 协力者职业
entries: 要获得专家职业，一个生物的数据板中必须至少具有一门它能说的语言。
{@note 注意：这个职业面向NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|tce}。}

classFeature.name: 灵巧动作
entries: {@i 2级专家特性}
协力者的迅捷或敏锐思维能让它迅速行动。在专家的战斗回合中，其可以用附赠动作执行使用{@action 疾走}，{@action 撤离}或{@action 躲藏}动作。

classFeature.name: 专精
entries: {@i 3级专家特性}
选择协力者的两项熟练技能。其进行所选熟练项的属性检定时可以加上双倍的熟练。
15级时，再选择两项协力者的熟练技能获得此增益。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 4级专家特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、10级、12级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 协同攻击
entries: {@i 6级专家特性}
协力者擅长在战斗配合进攻。当一位协力者使用好帮手特性协助一位盟友攻击一个生物时，其目标可以距离协力者最多30尺远。并且下一次协力者在当前回合结束前以一次攻击命中该生物时可以造成额外{@damage 2d6}伤害。该额外伤害类型与造成它的攻击伤害类型相同。

classFeature.name: 反射闪避
entries: {@i 7级专家特性}
由于特别的好运，协力者擅长于规避危险。当协力者被一个允许其进行一次敏捷豁免减半伤害的效应作为目标时，它在成功时不会受到伤害，而失败时只受到一半伤害。协力者在{@condition 无力}时不会获得该好处。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 8级专家特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、10级、12级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 10级专家特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、10级、12级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 鼓舞协助
entries: {@i 11级专家特性}
当协力者执行{@action 协助}动作时，受到协助的生物同时获得一枚额外加在{@dice d20}骰值上的{@dice 1d6}骰。如果掷骰的是攻击检定，则该生物可以放弃在攻击检定上加上骰值，然后在命中后的伤害中加上该骰值。
在20级时，该加值提升到{@dice 2d6}。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 12级专家特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、10级、12级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 可靠才能
entries: {@i 14级专家特性}
协力者的技能经过精炼而更趋于完美。每当协力者进行的属性检定可以使用熟练加值时，它可以将{@dice d20}中9或以下的结果都视为10。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 16级专家特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、10级、12级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 明锐心智
entries: {@i 18级专家特性}
协力者获得以下一项你所选豁免检定的熟练：智力，感知或魅力。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 19级专家特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、10级、12级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 鼓舞协助强化
entries: {@i 20级专家特性}
协力者的鼓舞协助的加值提升到{@dice 2d6}。

classFeature.name: 额外熟练
entries: {@i 1级施法者特性}
协力者获得以下一项你所选豁免检定的熟练：智力，感知，或魅力。
此外，协力者获得以下中2项你选技能的熟练：{@skill 奥秘}、{@skill 历史}、{@skill 洞悉}、{@skill 调查}、{@skill 医疗}、{@skill 表演}、{@skill 说服}和{@skill 宗教}。
协力者获得轻甲熟练。如果它是一个类人生物或在其资料版中具有一项简易或军用武器，它也会获得所有简易武器的熟练。

classFeature.name: 协力者职业
entries: 要获得施法者职业，一个生物的数据板中必须至少具有一门它能说的语言。
{@note 注意：这个职业面向NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|tce}。}

classFeature.name: 施法
entries: {@i 1级施法者特性}
协力者获得施展法术的能力（如果该生物已具有施法特质，该特性替换原本特质）。选择一项施法者职能：魔术师、治疗者或奇才。这选择将决定协力者的法术列表和使用的施法关键属性，见"施法表格"。

entries.name: 法术位
entries: "施法者表格"中显示了协力者施展其施法者法术的1环及更高环阶法术位数量。施展某个法术时，协力者必须同时消耗其对应环阶或更高的法术位。已消耗的法术位可在完成长休后恢复。

entries.name: 已知法术
entries: 协力者习得两个戏法和一个一环法术。这里有一些每个职能1级施法者的法术推荐：

items.name: 魔术师：
items.entry: {@spell 法师之手}, {@spell 冷冻射线}, {@spell 雷鸣波}

items.name: 治疗者：
items.entry: {@spell 治疗伤势}, {@spell 神导术}, {@spell 圣焰}

items.name: 奇才：
items.entry: {@spell 魔能爆}, {@spell 治愈真言}, {@spell 光亮术}

items: "施法者表格"的已知戏法和已知法术栏显示了协力者何时能习得由你选择的新法术。已知法术栏中的每个法术必须是协力者具有表中所示相应环阶的法术。例如，当协力者达到5级时，它能学习1个新的1环或2环法术。
此外，当协力者获得新的该职业等级时，你能选择一个它已知的法术并以一个新的法术替换它。新的法术可以是戏法，也可以一个是协力者具有对应法术位的法术。

entries.name: 施法关键属性
entries: 协力者法术的施法关键属性取决于你在"施法表格"中的选择。
当法术提到其属性时，协力者使用其施法关键属性。此外，在确定法术豁免DC和以法术进行攻击时它会使用施法关键属性调整值。

entries.name: 施法法器
entries: 协力者可以根据"施法表格"的选择来为它的法术使用一件法器。一位魔术师能够使用一件奥术法器，一位治疗者能够使用一面圣徽，而一位奇才能够使用一件奥术法器或一样{@item 乐器|PHB}。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 4级施法者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、16级、18级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 强力戏法
entries: {@i 6级施法者特性}
施法者施展戏法造成伤害时，可以再加上施法调整值。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 8级施法者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、16级、18级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 12级施法者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、16级、18级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 增强法术
entries: {@i 14级施法者特性}
选择一个魔法学派。当协力者消耗法术位施展该学派的法术时，如果法术能造成伤害或治疗生命值，它能将自己的施法关键属性调整值加到法术的伤害或者治疗骰值中。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 16级施法者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、16级、18级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 18级施法者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、16级、18级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 专注施法
entries: {@i 20级施法者特性}
受到伤害不会打断协力者对法术的专注。

classFeature.name: 额外熟练
entries: {@i 1级武者特性}
协力者获得以下一项你所选豁免检定的熟练：力量，敏捷或体质。
此外，协力者获得以下中2项你选技能的熟练：{@skill 体操}、{@skill 驯兽}、{@skill 运动}、{@skill 威吓}、{@skill 自然}、{@skill 察觉}和{@skill 生存}。
协力者获得所有护甲的熟练。如果它是一个类人生物或在其资料版中具有一项简易或军用武器，它也会获得盾牌和所有简易和军用武器的熟练。

classFeature.name: 战斗职能
entries: {@i 1级武者特性}
每位武者都侧重于进攻或防御的训练。从以下选项中选择一项：

items.name: 攻击手。
items.entry: 协力者在所有攻击检定时获得+2加值。

items.name: 防御者。
items.entry: 协力者能以反应动作反应迫使某个生物攻击武者身边5尺内除武者之外的目标时的一次攻击检定具有劣势。此时协力者必须看见攻击者。

classFeature.name: 协力者职业
entries: {@note 注意：这个职业面向NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|tce}。}

classFeature.name: 回气
entries: {@i 2级武者特性}
协力者可以以一个附赠动作恢复{@dice 1d10} + 其职业等级的生命值。如果其如此做，直到其完成一次长休或短休才能再次使用。
协力者在20级时可以在休息间使用该特性2次。

classFeature.name: 精通重击
entries: {@i 3级武者特性}
协力者的攻击在{@dice d20}掷出19或20时即可造成重击。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 4级武者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、14级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 额外攻击
entries: {@i 6级武者特性}
每当协力者在自己回合执行{@action 攻击}动作时，协力者可以发动两次攻击，而非一次。
从15级开始，协力者可以攻击三次。
如果协力者拥有多重攻击动作，它只能在一个回合内使用额外攻击和多重攻击之一。

classFeature.name: 备战
entries: {@i 7级武者特性}
协力者的先攻检定具有优势。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 8级武者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、14级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 精通防御
entries: {@i 10级武者特性}
协力者的AC提升1。

classFeature.name: 不屈
entries: {@i 11级武者特性}
协力者可以重掷失败的豁免检定。不过其必须采用重掷的结果。当使用此特性后，协力者必须完成一次长休才能再次使用。
从18级开始，协力者可以在两次长休之间使用两次该特性。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 12级武者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、14级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 14级武者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、14级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 额外攻击强化
entries: {@i 15级武者特性}
每当协力者在自己回合执行{@action 攻击}动作时，协力者可以发动三次攻击。
如果协力者拥有多重攻击动作，它只能在一个回合内使用额外攻击和多重攻击之一。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 16级武者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、14级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 不屈强化
entries: {@i 18级武者特性}
协力者可以在两次长休之间使用两次不屈。

classFeature.name: 属性值提升
entries: {@i 19级武者特性}
当协力者在此职业升至4级、8级、12级、14级、16级、19级时，协力者增加由你选择的一项自选属性值2点，或者可以增加二项自选属性值各1点。协力者不能通过这个能力将一个属性值提升至超过20。

classFeature.name: 回气强化
entries: {@i 20级武者特性}
协力者可以在两次休息之间使用两次回气。

classFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: At 1st level, the sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: Dexterity, Intelligence, or Constitution.
In addition, the sidekick gains proficiency in five skills of your choice. If the sidekick is a humanoid, it also gains proficiency with light armor, simple weapons, and two tools of your choice.
At 13th level, the sidekick gains proficiency in one skill of your choice. If the sidekick is a humanoid, it also gains proficiency with one tool of your choice.

classFeature.name: Expertise
entries: At 1st level, choose two of the sidekick's skill proficiencies. The sidekick's proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check it makes that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.
At 6th level and again at 17th level, choose two more of the sidekick's skill proficiencies to gain this benefit.

classFeature.name: Helpful
entries: The sidekick is adept at giving well-timed assistance; the sidekick can take the {@action 协助} action as a bonus action.

classFeature.name: Sidekick Class
entries: To gain the expert class, a creature must have at least one language in its stat block that it can speak.
{@note Note: this class is intended for NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|uasidekicks}.}

classFeature.name: Cunning Action
entries: Starting at 2nd level, the sidekick's agility or quick thinking allows it to act speedily. On its turn in combat, it can take the {@action 疾走}, {@action 撤离}, or {@action 躲藏} action as a bonus action.

classFeature.name: Jack of Many Trades
entries: Beginning at 3rd level, the sidekick can add half its proficiency bonus to any ability check it makes that uses a skill but doesn't already include its proficiency bonus.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: When you reach 4th level, and again at 8th, 10th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of your choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of your choice by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

When you gain the Ability Score Improvement feature from your class, you can also replace one of your skill proficiencies with a skill proficiency offered by your class at 1st level (the proficiency you replace needn't be from the class).
This change represents one of your skills atrophying as you focus on a different skill.

classFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: Starting at 5th level, the sidekick can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the {@action 攻击} action on its turn.

classFeature.name: Expertise
entries: At 6th level, you gain another Expertise.

classFeature.name: Evasion
entries: Beginning at 7th level, because of extraordinary good luck, the sidekick is skilled at avoiding certain dangers. When the sidekick is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed. The sidekick doesn't benefit from this feature while {@condition 无力}.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 8th level, you gain another Ability Score Improvement.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 8th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

When you gain the Ability Score Improvement feature from your class, you can also replace one of your skill proficiencies with a skill proficiency offered by your class at 1st level (the proficiency you replace needn't be from the class).
This change represents one of your skills atrophying as you focus on a different skill.

classFeature.name: Inspiring Help (1d6)
entries: Starting at 9th level, the sidekick's assistance becomes especially inspiring. When the sidekick uses its Helpful bonus action, the creature who receives the help also gains a {@dice 1d6} bonus to the {@dice d20} roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against one target.
At 18th level, the bonus increases to {@dice 2d6}.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 10th level, you gain another Ability Score Improvement.

entries: {@i 10th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

classFeature.name: Reliable Talent
entries: By 11th level, the sidekick has refined its skills to an exceptional degree. Whenever the sidekick makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a {@dice d20} roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

classFeature.name: Stroke of Luck
entries: At 20th level, the sidekick has an uncanny knack for turning failure into success. If the sidekick's attack misses a target within range, it can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if it fails an ability check, it can treat the {@dice d20} roll as a 20.
Once it uses this feature, the sidekick can't use it again until it finishes a short or long rest.

classFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: When the sidekick joins this class, the sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma.

In addition, the sidekick gains proficiency in three skills of your choice from the following list: {@skill 奥秘}, {@skill 历史}, {@skill 洞悉}, {@skill 调查}, {@skill 医疗}, {@skill 表演}, {@skill 说服}, and {@skill 宗教}. If the sidekick is a humanoid, it also gains proficiency with simple weapons and light armor.

classFeature.name: Sidekick Class
entries: To gain the spellcaster class, a creature must have at least one language in its stat block that it can speak.
{@note Note: this class is intended for NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|uasidekicks}.}

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: At 1st level, the sidekick gains the ability to cast spells. (If the creature already has the Spellcasting trait, this feature replaces that trait.) Choose a class: bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard. This choice determines the spell list, spellcasting ability, and spellcasting focus used by the sidekick, as shown on the Spellcasting table.

entries.name: 戏法
entries: At first level, the sidekick knows three cantrips of your choice from its spell list. The sidekick learns additional cantrips of your choice at higher levels, as shown in the Cantrips Known column of the Spellcaster table.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Spellcaster table shows how many spell slots the sidekick has to cast its spellcaster spells of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, the sidekick must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. The spellcaster regains all expended spell slots when it finishes a long rest.
For example, if the sidekick knows the 1st-level spell {@spell 治疗伤势} and has a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, it can cast the spell using either slot.

entries.name: Spells Known
entries: The sidekick knows three 1st-level spells of your choice from its spell list.

The Spells Known column of the Spellcaster table shows when the sidekick learns more spells of your choice. Each of these spells must be of a level for which the sidekick has spell slots, as shown on the table. For instance when the sidekick reaches 3rd level in this class, it can learn one new spell of 1st or 2nd level.

Additionally, when the sidekick gains a level in this class, you can choose one of the spells it knows from this class and replace it with another spell from its spell list, which also must be of a level for which it has spell slots.

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: The sidekick's spellcasting ability for these spells depends on the choice you made on the Spellcasting table.

The sidekick uses its spellcasting ability whenever a spell refers to that ability. In addition, it uses its spellcasting ability modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a spell it casts and when making an attack roll with one.

entries.name: 施法法器
entries: The sidekick can use a focus for its spells depending on the choice you made on the Spellcasting table.

classFeature.name: Magical Recovery
entries: Beginning at 2nd level, when the sidekick finishes a short rest, it can recover expended spell slots. The spell slots can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half its level in this class (rounded up), and none of the spell slots can be 6th level or higher.
Once the sidekick uses this feature, it can't use the feature again until it finishes a long rest.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: When you reach 4th level, and again at 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of your choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of your choice by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

When you gain the Ability Score Improvement feature from your class, you can also replace one of your skill proficiencies with a skill proficiency offered by your class at 1st level (the proficiency you replace needn't be from the class).
This change represents one of your skills atrophying as you focus on a different skill.

classFeature.name: Potent Cantrips
entries: Starting at 6th level, the sidekick can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 8th level, you gain another Ability Score Improvement.

entries: {@i 8th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

classFeature.name: Empowered Spells
entries: At 10th level, choose one school of magic. Whenever the sidekick casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, the sidekick can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell's damage roll or healing roll, if any.

classFeature.name: Focused Casting
entries: Starting at 14th level, the sidekick has advantage on any Constitution saving throw it makes to maintain its concentration on a spell.

classFeature.name: Signature Spells
entries: At 20th level, choose two spells that the sidekick knows from this class. Eligible spells are of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd level. The sidekick can cast each of the chosen spell once at 3rd level without expending a spell slot. After the sidekick casts a spell in this way, the sidekick regains the ability to cast that spell with this feature when it finishes a short or long rest.

classFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: At 1st level, the sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution.

In addition, the sidekick gains proficiency in three skills of your choice from the following list: {@skill 体操}, {@skill 驯兽}, {@skill 运动}, {@skill 威吓}, {@skill 自然}, {@skill 察觉}, and {@skill 生存}. If the sidekick is a humanoid, it also gains proficiency with all armor, shields, and simple and martial weapons.

classFeature.name: Second Wind
entries: Starting at 1st level, the sidekick can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + its level in this class. Once it uses this feature, it must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.
The sidekick can use this feature twice between rests starting at 18th level.

classFeature.name: Danger Sense
entries: Beginning at 2nd level, the sidekick has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that it can see, such as traps and spells. This feature doesn't work if the sidekick is {@condition 无力}.

classFeature.name: Improved Critical
entries: Starting at 3rd level, the sidekick's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (1 extra)
entries: Beginning at 5th level, the sidekick can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the {@action 攻击} action on its turn.
The number of attacks increases to three when the sidekick reaches 11th level and to four when it reaches 20th level.

entries: Starting at 9th level, the sidekick can reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new roll. When it uses this feature, it can't use the feature again unless it finishes a long rest.
The sidekick can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 13th level and three times between long rests starting at 17th level.
